frozen_definition.name: MemeCache
frozen_definition.signal_source: Digital organization research shows users struggle with 'too messy' photo libraries and 'can't find' specific content when needed
frozen_definition.description: Visual meme organization app with AI-powered tagging, mood-based categories, and instant search for the perfect meme reaction
frozen_definition.target_user: Active social media users who save hundreds of memes but struggle to find the right one when needed
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report digital meme collections become unmanageable, leading to frustration when seeking specific memes for conversations
core_loop: Search by text, emotion, or visual similarity
Create custom collections for specific contexts
frozen_definition.differentiation: Focus purely on meme organization vs. general photo management, uses humor-specific AI categorization
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited storage, advanced search, custom categories, and cross-device sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for up to 100 memes, premium for unlimited storage and advanced features
